comment:
* Config to set Battery Saver policy flags.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
public float getAdjustBrightnessFactor()
methods.comment:
* How much to adjust the screen brightness while in Battery Saver. This will have no effect
     * if {@link #getEnableAdjustBrightness()} is {@code false}.

methods.name: public boolean getAdvertiseIsEnabled()
methods.comment: * Whether or not to tell the system (and other apps) that Battery Saver is currently enabled.

methods.name: public boolean getDeferFullBackup()
methods.comment: Whether or not to defer full backup while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getDeferKeyValueBackup()
methods.comment: Whether or not to defer key-value backup while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Map<String, String> getDeviceSpecificSettings()
methods.comment: * Returns the device-specific battery saver constants.

methods.name: public boolean getDisableAnimation()
methods.comment: Whether or not to disable animation while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getDisableAod()
methods.comment: Whether or not to disable Always On Display while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getDisableLaunchBoost()
methods.comment: Whether or not to disable launch boost while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getDisableOptionalSensors()
methods.comment: Whether or not to disable optional sensors while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getDisableSoundTrigger()
methods.comment:
* Whether or not to disable {@link android.hardware.soundtrigger.SoundTrigger}
     * while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getDisableVibration()
methods.comment: Whether or not to disable vibration while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getEnableAdjustBrightness()
methods.comment: Whether or not to enable brightness adjustment while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getEnableDataSaver()
methods.comment: Whether or not to enable Data Saver while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getEnableFirewall()
methods.comment:
* Whether or not to enable network firewall rules to restrict background network use
     * while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getEnableNightMode()
methods.comment: Whether or not to enable night mode while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getEnableQuickDoze()
methods.comment: Whether or not to enable Quick Doze while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getForceAllAppsStandby()
methods.comment: Whether or not to force all apps to standby mode while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public boolean getForceBackgroundCheck()
methods.comment:
* Whether or not to force background check (disallow background services and manifest
     * broadcast receivers) on all apps (not just apps targeting Android
     * {@link Build.VERSION_CODES#O} and above)
     * while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public int getLocationMode()
methods.comment: The location mode while in Battery Saver.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
